headDescription: ONE 0000 0001 is a electronic musician. On this website, ONE 0000 0001 presents his projects : ONE HUMAN FACTOR, DRONOISIUM and FETISHGROUND. You'll also find some videos and photos
pageHeaderImageAlt: ONE 0000 0001 portrait for the header image
sectionTextP: I'm ONE 0000 0001. I run several experimental electronic music projects. My main project is ONE HUMAN FACTOR which is a mix of electronic music and noise. The second one is DRONOISIUM wich is a drone music project that goes from hypnotic Drone to Harsh Noise Wall. The third one is Fetishground which I started as Fleshware. The debut album of FETISHGROUND is a kind of oppressive electro pop and the EPs are experimental ambiant.
I like to make videos for my tracks. You'll find a lot of them on my vimeo, the link is at the bottom of this page.
Below, you'll find some videos and links to the websites of my projects.
textLinkGoTop: Go To the Top of this page

ONE HUMAN FACTOR live @ La Grange Ã  Musique on the charity event "Les rockeurs ont du coeur" 2019.
sectionCardData: ONE HUMAN FACTOR is my main project. I started it under the name of "ONE". Many years later, It became "ONE HUMAN FACTOR". It's mainly a live project with a lot of improvisions. The tracks are based on noise on beats.
DRONOISIUM is a total different project. No beats, mainly long sounds that evolve slowly. From hypnotic drones to immersive HNW.
A project with a lot of gasmask in the videos ! I worked very hard and during a long period of time, every Sunday for a few years, to make the seventeen tracks of the debut album.
